languages.text: "Вот так был человек — и нет человека. Она даже не узнает, ради чего погибла. А ткачи продолжат вершить что им вздумается".

traits.locale_text: "Вот так был человек — и нет человека. Она даже не узнает, ради чего погибла".

languages.text: "And just like that, she's gone. She will never even know what she died for. Meanwhile, the spinners go on passing whatever judgement they please."
languages.original_text: "Вот так был человек — и нет человека. Она даже не узнает, ради чего погибла. А ткачи продолжат вершить что им вздумается".

traits.locale_text: "And just like that, she's gone. She will never even know what she died for. Meanwhile, the spinners go on passing whatever judgement they please."
"And just like that, she's gone. She will never even know what she died for. Meanwhile, the spinners go on passing whatever judgement they please."
"And just like that, she's gone. She will never even know what she died for. Meanwhile, the spinners go on passing whatever judgement they please."
"And just like that, she's gone. She will never even know what she died for. Meanwhile, the spinners go on passing whatever judgement they please."
"And just like that, she's gone. She will never even know what she died for. Meanwhile, the spinners go on passing whatever judgement they please."
"And just like that, she's gone. She will never even know what she died for. Meanwhile, the spinners go on passing whatever judgement they please."

languages.text: «Y así, sin más, se extingue su luz. Nunca sabrá siquiera por qué ha tenido que morir. Entre tanto, los tejedores siguen ahí, emitiendo juicios a placer».
languages.original_text: "And just like that, she's gone. She will never even know what she died for. Meanwhile, the spinners go on passing whatever judgement they please."

traits.locale_text: «Y así, sin más, se extingue su luz. Nunca sabrá siquiera por qué ha tenido que morir. Entre tanto, los tejedores siguen ahí, emitiendo juicios a placer».

languages.text: 「そして彼女は逝ってしまった。彼女は何のために死んだのかさえ知ることもない。その間、紡績工たちは好き勝手に裁きを下し続ける」
languages.original_text: "And just like that, she's gone. She will never even know what she died for. Meanwhile, the spinners go on passing whatever judgement they please."

traits.locale_text: 「そして彼女は逝ってしまった。彼女は何のために死んだのかさえ知ることもない。その間、紡績工たちは好き勝手に裁きを下し続ける」

languages.text: “就这样，她死了。她永远都不明白自己为什么会死，而与此同时，那些织网者却可以继续随心所欲地做出评判。”
languages.original_text: "And just like that, she's gone. She will never even know what she died for. Meanwhile, the spinners go on passing whatever judgement they please."

traits.locale_text: “就这样，她死了。她永远都不明白自己为什么会死，而与此同时，那些织网者却可以继续随心所欲地做出评判。”

languages.text: "Und jetzt ist sie tot. Einfach so. Sie wird nie erfahren, wofür sie gestorben ist. In der Zwischenzeit urteilen die Spinner darüber, wie es ihnen beliebt."
languages.original_text: "And just like that, she's gone. She will never even know what she died for. Meanwhile, the spinners go on passing whatever judgement they please."

traits.locale_text: "Und jetzt ist sie tot. Einfach so. Sie wird nie erfahren, wofür sie gestorben ist. In der Zwischenzeit urteilen die Spinner darüber, wie es ihnen beliebt."

languages.text: « Elle s'est éteinte sur le coup, mouchée comme une flamme. Elle ne saura jamais pourquoi elle est morte. Et pendant ce temps, les tisseurs continuent à imposer leur jugement comme ça leur chante. »
languages.original_text: "And just like that, she's gone. She will never even know what she died for. Meanwhile, the spinners go on passing whatever judgement they please."

traits.locale_text: « Elle s'est éteinte sur le coup, mouchée comme une flamme. Elle ne saura jamais pourquoi elle est morte. Et pendant ce temps, les tisseurs continuent à imposer leur jugement comme ça leur chante. »

languages.text: "Öyle birdenbire gidiverdi. Ne uğruna öldüğünü asla bilemeyecek. Bu esnada dokurlar, keyiflerince adalet dağıtmaya devam ediyor."
languages.original_text: "And just like that, she's gone. She will never even know what she died for. Meanwhile, the spinners go on passing whatever judgement they please."
